migest 2.0.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

migest

Tools for estimating, measuring and working with migration data. See the pkgdown site for more information

Installation

You can install the released version of migest from CRAN with:

install.packages("migest")

And the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("guyabel/migest")
